body_html:
Hey @sareg0 – thanks for the PR! 🍬

Can you add the the new fields to app/views/application_drafts/_student_fields.html.slim as well (plus updating the student_params in ApplicationDraftsController) ? Ideally the fields should be shared really, but currently they're separate.
body_text:
Hey @sareg0 – thanks for the PR! 🍬
Can you add the the new fields to app/views/application_drafts/_student_fields.html.slim as well (plus updating the student_params in ApplicationDraftsController) ? Ideally the fields should be shared really, but currently they're separate.
body:
Hey @sareg0 – thanks for the PR! :candy: 

Can you add the the new fields to `app/views/application_drafts/_student_fields.html.slim` as well (plus updating the `student_params` in `ApplicationDraftsController`) ? Ideally the fields should be shared really, but currently they're separate.
